title: 菊花賞の後に・菊の舞台で見せし背中

text.jpText:
『菊花賞』はメジロライアンが制した。
アイネスフウジンは疲労からレース後に倒れ、
目を覚ました彼女は、そのことを悔いていた。
text.enText:
The "Kikka-sho" was won by Mejiro Ryan. Ines 
Foujin collapsed after the race from fatigue. 
When she woke up, she regretted it.

text.jpText:
彼女は帰省した際に知ったのだ。妹たちが
姉の夢を支えるため、病弱な母に代わり
家事をするべく、ダンス教室を辞めたことを。
text.enText:
She found out when she returned home. She 
learned when she returned home that her 
younger sisters had quit their dance classes 
to support her sister's dream She quit her 
dance class to take care of the household 
chores to support her sister's dream.

text.jpText:
アイネスフウジンは妹たちの心配を
取り払うため、バイトを増やし、
走り方を変えようともがいていたのだ。
text.enText:
Ines Fouzin struggled to get more part-time 
work and to change her running style 
in order to relieve her sisters' worries. 
She struggled to change the way she 
ran her business.

text.jpText:
話してくれればよかった、と言うのは簡単だ。
だが周囲にも余計な心配をかけまいと
1人で抱え込んでしまったのだろう。
text.enText:
It is easy to say, "You should have told us. 
But she didn't want to cause unnecessary 
worry to those around her. I think she was so 
worried that she kept it all to herself.

text.jpText:
アイネスフウジンの悩みは、自分の悩み。
2人で協力して解決すると約束し、余裕を
持たせて『大阪杯』を目標にするのだった。
text.enText:
Ainess Fuzin's problems are her own. The two 
promised to work together to solve them, and 
they set their sights on the "Osaka Cup" with 
plenty of time to spare. They promised to 
work together to solve the problem, and set 
the "Osaka Cup" as their goal.
